document_data.name: [[Trezmur]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Trezmur''' was a servant to House [[Delcastle]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Trezmur was assigned to standing in front of the noblewoman [[Marantine Delcastle]]'s door with a crossbow, keeping it trained on the noble heir [[Arclath Delcastle]], every time he left his mother's chambers, as of [[Mirtul]] in the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, to Arclath's perplexment.
